attributes.action: Reinstate water, fuel, medical supplies and food to Gaza immediately.
attributes.additional_details: Raise this issue diplomatically with both the US and Israel, raise this issue at the UN security council and before the whole UN, and to call publicly for Israel to target military targets exclusively and thus to minimise the suffering of innocent parties.
attributes.background: Call upon the Emergency Government of Israel to do their utmost to ensure that the innocent civilians in Gaza are immediately able to access their fundamental human rights.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648383
